column4: Hi I've installed the boinc packages via apt-get in the terminal but now I have no idea how to get it running or enter my details etc
From menu check for boinc manager
it's not there
Applications > System Tools
only got apt key manager there
sudo apt-get install boinc-manager boinc-client
thanks doing it now
Np, do you have accounts for boinc projects? AAnd remember graphics don't wokr(atleast on seti) in linux
yeah I do with Seti shame about graphics but thats life.
Atleast when I last time used the graphics didn't work. You can click the buton to the end of your life, but no graphics showed for me.
I'm a newly converted windoze user and very happy with it.
Glad you remembered me about BOINC :) I forgot I installed it.
np
yeah I think rsi would be more likely than graphics on seti lol ... I clicked several times
You can get graphics
But in my computer when other programs running same time as boinc ti's slow
how?
run sudo xhost +si:localuser:boinc
Then System-Preferences-Sessions-Startup Programs
Add sudo xhost +si:localuser:boinc there as command, not name
That should do it.
